SEARCH
Package org.application.students

Interface IStudentsService

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentsService
public interface IStudentsService
Represents a service interface for managing Student entities. This interface defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to student service.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      Student addStudent(String name, String registrationNumber, int year, String groupName) throws StudentAdditionException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Student with the given name, registration number, year and group name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the new Student.
      registrationNumber - The registration number of the new Student.
      year - The year of the new Student.
      groupName - The group name of the new Student.
      Returns:
      The newly created Student.
      Throws:
      StudentAdditionException - If the Student could not be added.
      ValidationException - If the provided name, registration number, year or group name are invalid.

    • updateStudent

      Student updateStudent(int studentId, String name, int year) throws StudentUpdateException, ValidationException
      Updates a Student with the given id.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The id of the Student to update.
      name - The new name of the Student.
      year - The new year of the Student.
      Returns:
      The updated Student.
      Throws:
      StudentUpdateException - If the Student could not be updated.
      ValidationException - If the provided id, name or year are invalid.

    • deleteStudent

      boolean deleteStudent(int studentId) throws StudentNotFoundException, StudentDeletionFailed
      Deletes a Student with the given id.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The id of the Student to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Student was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the Student with the given id was not found.
      StudentDeletionFailed - If the Student could not be deleted.

    • deleteStudents

      boolean deleteStudents(String registrationNumber) throws StudentNotFoundException, StudentDeletionFailed
      Deletes a Student with the given registration number.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The registration number of the Student to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Student was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the Student with the given registration number was not found.
      StudentDeletionFailed - If the Student could not be deleted.

    • deleteAll

      boolean deleteAll() throws StudentDeletionFailed
      Deletes all Student entities.
      Returns:
      True if all Student entities were deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      StudentDeletionFailed - If the Student entities could not be deleted.

    • deleteStudent

      boolean deleteStudent(String registrationNumber) throws StudentNotFoundException, StudentDeletionFailed
      Deletes a Student with the given registration number.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The registration number of the Student to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Student was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the Student with the given registration number was not found.
      StudentDeletionFailed - If the Student could not be deleted.

    • reassignStudent

      Student reassignStudent(int studentId, String newGroupName) throws StudentGroupReassignException, RepositoryOperationException, ValidationException
      Reassigns a Student with the given id to a new group.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The id of the Student to reassign.
      newGroupName - The new group name of the Student.
      Returns:
      The reassigned Student.
      Throws:
      StudentGroupReassignException - If the Student could not be reassigned.
      RepositoryOperationException - If the Student could not be reassigned.
      ValidationException - If the provided id or group name are invalid.

    • getStudentById

      Student getStudentById(int studentId) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Gets a Student with the given id.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The id of the Student to get.
      Returns:
      The Student with the given id.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the Student with the given id was not found.

    • getStudentByRegistrationNumber

      Student getStudentByRegistrationNumber(String registrationNumber) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Gets a Student with the given registration number.
      Parameters:
      registrationNumber - The registration number of the Student to get.
      Returns:
      The Student with the given registration number.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - If the Student with the given registration number was not found.

    • getStudents

      List<Student> getStudents()
      Gets all Student entities.
      Returns:
      A list of all Student entities.

    • getStudentsByGroupNameAndYear

      List<Student> getStudentsByGroupNameAndYear(String groupName, int year)
      Retrieves all Student entities with the given group name and year.
      Parameters:
      groupName - The group name of the Student entities to retrieve.
      year - The year of the Student entities to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Student entities with the given group name and year.
